message: I propose we divide the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the potential decrease in value over time.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a more balanced approach, considering the value depreciation will affect you less than me.
Considering the inflation and its impact on the value of money, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a balance while ensuring a reasonable return for both parties.
